level.heading: CALCULATION OF THE HOSPITAL SPECIFIC COST PER DISCHARGE OF INDIRECT MEDICALDUCATION (ยง 29-4804)

level.text: The hospital specific cost per discharge of indirect medical education shall be calculated as follows:
The cost per discharge adjusted for case mix shall be divided by the indirect medical education factor set forth in Subsection 4802.5.
The amount established pursuant to Subsection 4804.1(a) shall be subtracted from the average cost per discharge adjusted for case mix.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 4141, 4146 (June 26, 1998); as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 2691 (March 26, 2010) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 6837 (July 10, 2010) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4323, 4327 (May 20, 2011); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 15078 (December 28, 2012).
